justification: Misreads Team B: a conservative, zero-RB manager is unlikely to trade away a Tier 1 workhorse (Ryan Taylor) and a Tier 2 WR for two Tier 5 pieces. Calling Robinson “stable” and Anderson “consistent” contradicts their profiles. Minimal evidence of B’s motives beyond a vague ‘contrarian’ note; no discussion of rosters, tiers, or playoff context. The offer is lopsided and unrealistic, so acceptance probability is overstated.
